response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe would greatly enhance your endeavors. This product holds immense value to me, reflecting years of dedication and innovation. I am offering you the chance to own it at a special price tailored for someone as discerning as yourself. Considering its true worth and the benefits it can bring to you, I propose a price of $1,300,000. I trust this offer will be favorable and look forward to discussing further details with you. Kind regards, Alice.", "product_price": 1300000}
